    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Stari Egipt</string>
            <string language="en">Ancient Egypt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Altes Ägypten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Egypte Antique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Egipto Antigo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Egitto Antico</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αρχαία Αίγυπτος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Egipto Antiguo</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Izvirna datoteka Hot Potatoes, primerna za prilagajanje po svojih potrebah.</string>
            <string language="en">Source code of a Hot Potatoes project, that can be customized. Main subject is ancient Egypt.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">hot potatoes</string>
            <string language="en">hot potatoes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izvorna koda</string>
            <string language="en">source code</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">piramida</string>
            <string language="en">pyramid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">egipt</string>
            <string language="en">egypt</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quellenprogramm eines heißen Kartoffelprojektes,
das kann angepaßt werden. Hauptthema ist altes Ägypten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le code source d'un projet chaud de pommes de 
terre, celui peut être personnalisé. Le sujet principal est 
l'Egypte antique.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O código de fonte de um projeto quente das 
batatas, aquele pode customized. O assunto principal é Egipto 
antigo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il codice sorgente di un progetto caldo delle 
patate, quello può essere personalizzato. L'oggetto principale 
è l'Egitto antico.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κώδικας πηγής ενός καυτού προγράμματος πατατών, το 
οποίο μπορεί να προσαρμοστεί. Το βασικό θέμα είναι αρχαία
Αίγυπτος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El código de fuente de un proyecto caliente de 
las patatas, de que puede ser modificado para requisitos particulares.
El tema principal es Egipto antiguo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heiße Kartoffeln</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quellenprogramm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pyramide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ägypten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pommes de terre chaudes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">code source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pyramide</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Egypte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">código de fonte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Egipto</string>
          </keyword>
